senses.sense_definition: Any organism that practices commensalism, benefiting from another organism without harming or helping it.

examples.text: The cattle egret is a well-known <w>commensalist</w> that follows livestock to eat the insects they disturb.
In this biological relationship, the <w>commensalist</w> gains protection while the host remains indifferent.
The scientist described the <w>commensalist</w> interaction between the two marine species.
We observed a <w>commensalist</w> behavior where the bird used the tree for nesting without affecting it.
